name: Kettle Grove: Critter Crafters
description:
Welcome to Kettle Grove where you will work with a friend or alone to play minigames to craft fun and Whimsical items to further help the Anokee of the village.

FEEDBACK LINK

https://forms.gle/V93qXqxDNzp83kPu8

Controls

WASD - Movement

E - Interact
